casebody.data:
STATE
v.
Thomas Earl GRIFFIN 270A18-1 Supreme Court of North Carolina. August 24, 2018 James R. Grant, Assistant Appellate Defender, for Griffin, Thomas Earl

Glenn Gerding, Appellate Defender

Daniel O'Brien, Assistant Attorney General, Joseph Finarelli, Special Deputy Attorney General, Mary Carla Babb, Assistant Attorney General, Teresa M. Postell, Assistant Attorney General, Scott E. Thomas, District Attorney, for State of North Carolina

The following order has been entered on the motion filed on the 24th of August 2018 by State of NC for Temporary Stay:

"Motion Allowed by order of the Court in conference, this the 24th of August 2018."
